channel.title: Kevin Falting
channel.description: Building community, writing software, and always learning.

item.title: Init Commit
item.description:
I’ve finally converted my site over to github pages from squarespace! I was paying some stupid amount of money to keep it there and now I can completely customize my site. I’ve built it using Jekyll and hosted it using Github Pages with absolutely no cost. This was an awesome learning experience and will continue to be as I get better. However, I’m sure that my website here will remain pretty simple.

I’ve never had a website that I could post whatever I like on, so here goes!

$ git commit -m "init commit"
